page.title: 15Village recreation
page.content: All three villages are socially thriving & form caring communities with an active church life. Regular {events}in the villages include dominios,whist drives,ladies circle womens institute & yoga classes. Those wishing to take part specialist activities must go out of the area. Cricket,tennis,snooker & darts are also enjoyed. Because of the demands of farming & tourism organised activities are largly confined to the winter months.{Hobbies}include reading craftwork,photography,music,painting, walking,hacking & hunting,bee keeping & shooting. Gardening is popular & people look foreward to exhibiting at the local shows. Most families have a cat or dog & rabbits,small rodents ducks,geese & lambs are also kept as pets.Some keep horses & there is an African Grey Parrot called Jake.
